handlers.description: Used to define the handler build properties. Each Lambda function is represented by a handler.

path.description: The path to the file that contains the handler function.

externalDependencies.description: Dependencies to keep external to the bundle. (`none` (default), `all`, or an array of module names)

excludeAwsSdk.description: Should the AWS SDK be excluded? The SDK is part of the Lambda runtime. Set this option to false, if a different SDK version is needed. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/lambda-nodejs.html)

tsConfig.description: File path of the TypeScript configuration.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

outputFileName.description: Name of the handler output file.

zipFilterRegExp.description: Regular expression that is used to filter out contents of the handler ZIP file. Remove the option if you don't want to have any filtering.

treeshake.description: Define the Rollup tree shaking option. Use the 'rollupConfig' option, if more control over the tree shaking process is needed. (https://rollupjs.org/configuration-options/#treeshake)

deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply `glob`. Defaults to the workspace root.

output.description: Relative path within the output folder.
